channel.title: taiwan on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in taiwan on madewhere

item.title: Estwing
item.description: Estwing is a tool manufacturer, specializing in hammers. A large number of their products are USA-made, with exceptions being their specialty fiberglass and plastic hammers which are made in Taiwan.

item.title: Channellock
item.description: Channellock is a tool manufacturer, probably best known for their channel-locking pliers. They offer a variety of gripping tools, made in the USA. Products which are USA-made carry a prominent label. Other items may not specify their origins on product pages.
